data.text: Yaye Nyasaye ma apako,
nimar joma timbegi richo gi jo-miriambo osemonja gi wechegi;
Gilwora koni gi koni gi weche mag achaya;
An aherogi to gin to gimon koda.
Gichula rach kar ber,
Ket ngʼat marach mondo oked kod jasika;
Kiyale to mi mondo oyude gi ketho,
Mad ngʼad ndalone dok manok;
Mad nyithinde dongʼ kiye
Mad nyithinde lokre jokwecho mabayo abaya;
Mad jagope moro mak gige duto ma en-go
Onego ngʼato kik timne ngʼwono
Kothe duto mondo kargi olal nono,
Mad Jehova Nyasaye sik kaparo richo mane wuonegi otimo;
Richogi mondo osiki e nyim Jehova Nyasaye,
Nimar kane ongima to ne ok odewo timo ngʼwono,
Nohero kwongʼo ji
Ne orwako kwongʼ ka nangane;
Mad ochal nanga moumogo dende duto,
Mano ema mondo obed chudo, ma Jehova Nyasaye chulo joma donjona;
To in, yaye Jehova Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto,
Nimar adhier kendo achando,
Ndalona rumo mos mos ka tipo mar odhiambo
Chongena onyosore nikech onge gima acham,
Alokora gima ijaro ne joma donjona;
Konya, yaye Jehova Nyasaye Nyasacha,
Mi mondo gingʼe ni achal kama nikech lweti,
Gin ginyalo kwongʼa to angʼeyo ni in ibiro gwedha;
Wichkuot maduongʼ biro mako joma donjona
Abiro dhialo Jehova Nyasaye malich gi dhoga;
Nimar ochungʼ e bat korachwich mar ngʼat mochando,
